title: Have any Blackpink members acted in any movies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Based on what I know about them, none of them have been part of any movies just yet. I am not closing the door in the idea of possibility that one of them can act in a movie someday. Among them, it is Jisoo that we all can expect to do a cameo or star in her own movie. Jisoo before being the lovely girl we love from Blackpink have been doing acting in music videos and TV dramas. Just recently she joined the cast of Arthdal Chronicles where she made the show trend on social media.

There is only BLACKPINK that has ever acted is Jisoo. She hasn’t been in a movie that I am aware of. But she has in been in TV Shows.  Arthdal Chronicles  The Producers These are the ones she is mostly known for but there are a few more.
